item.title: AI Assistant Prompt Catalog
item.description: AI Assistant prompt catalog Prompts Android: Replace kotlin synthetic view viewBinding @author: https://x.com/jcraane Kotlin synthetics are deprecated. This prompt replaces Kotlin synthetics in a file with viewBinding: Replace kotlin synthetic with viewBinding. Prefix all Koltin synthetic views with binding. Replace snake case view names with camel casing. $SELECTION Create a unit test using Kotest and BehaviorSpec @author: https://x.com/jcraane You are an expert AI programmer which uses unit tests to verify behavior.
